Utilising microbes to protect crops from pathogens

Pioneering research into wheat take-all disease being carried out at Imperial College London, Silwood Park.

We are working with farmers across the UK to enhance crop yields sustainably by optimising the microbial communities of the soil our crops grow in.

See our About page to read more about our mission.

Department of Life Sciences, Silwood Park
Imperial College London
Buckhurst Rd, Berks SL5 7PY, UK
